Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE USE DISORDERS

Title: Requires health care professionals to inquire about the opioid history of certain patients
Summary: Requires that where a health care professional or professionals require the completion of an allergy checklist or form by the patient, prior to receiving care by such professional or professionals, the checklist or form shall also inquire about the opioid history of such patient.
LawCode: Add ยง3309-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requesting the opioid history of certain persons
